Package es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel

Provides the core classes necessary to create any model and to simulate it.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
BasicElementCreator An indicator of a class that it can create elements
EventExecutor A class capable to run events.
 

Class Summary
Activity A task which could be carried out by a WorkItem and requires certain amount and type of resources to be performed.
ActivityManager Partition of activities.
ActivityManagerCreator  
BasicElement Represents the simulation component that carries out events.
ConditionDrivenGenerator A generator driven by simulation events.
Element Represents case instances that make use of activity flows in order to carry out their events.
ElementCreator Defines the way a generator creates elements when it's time to create them.
ElementCreator.GenerationTrio Description of a set of elements a generator can create.
ElementType Describes a set of elements which have something in common.
FlowDrivenActivity An Activity that could be carried out by an Element and whose duration depends on the finalization of an internal Flow.
Generator An element which creates elements.
Resource A resource is an element that becomes available at a specific simulation time and becomes unavailable at other simulation time.
ResourceType Represents the different roles that can be found in the system.
Simulation Main parallel discrete event simulation class.
SimulationObject An identifiable object belonging to a simulation which can be compared.
StandardActivityManagerCreator  
TimeDrivenActivity A task which could be carried out by an element in a specified time.
TimeDrivenGenerator A generator which creates elements following a temporal pattern.
TimeStampedSimulationObject A simulation object which has knowledge of the simulation time.
VariableStoreSimulationObject An identifiable object belonging to a simulation which can be compared and can use simulation variables.
WorkGroup A set of pairs <ResourceType, Integer> which defines how many resources from each type are required to do something (typically an Activity).
WorkItem Represents an element carrying out an activity.
WorkThread A sequential branch of activities in an element's flow.
WorkToken The information of the current state of a work thread.
 

Package es.ull.iis.simulation.parallel Description

Provides the core classes necessary to create any model and to simulate it. This package implements a kind of parallel Three-Phase simulation approach. When used purely, the three-phase approach divides the events in Bs and Cs. Bs are events scheduled to be executed at a specific timestamp, whereas Cs are conditional events.
